rules_text:
Flying
Whenever this creature enters or deals combat damage to a player, create a Salvage token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, draw it. Otherwise, you may mill it.”)[/i]
Whenever you mill one or more cards, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
